SALEM

Ramakrishna Mission Ashrama: Narai S. Nellaippan speaks on ‘Swami Akhadananda’s life’, 7 p.m.

Sri Prasanna Varadaraja Perumal Devasthanam: Margazhi Tiruppavai Upanyasa Mahotsavam, B. M. Sathya Ram Acharya delivers upanyasam, Vasantha mandapam, Chinnakadai street, 6.45 a.m.

Tiruvembavai Peruvizha Kazhagam Trust: Tiruvembavai peruvizha, Tiruvembavai parayanam, Arulmigu Sugavaneswara Swamy Temple, 5.15 a.m.

Margazhi Peruvizha Committee: Margazhi festival, E. Jayaraj from Sri Lanka, delivers relay discourse on ‘Mahabaratham’, Ammapettai Sengunthar marriage hall, 7 p.m.

Sri Skandasramam Trust, Udaiyapatti: Hanuman Jayanthi, yagasalai pravesam, Sri Vallaba Ganapathi homam, Sri Navagraha homam, Aavahanthi homam, poornahudi, 7 a.m.; special abishekams, 11 a.m.; bhajans by M. R. Sriram Bhagavathar troupe and bhajans and namasangeerthanam by Thiagu Bagavathar, 11 a.m.

Infant Jesus Cathedral, Arisipalayam: Pangu Peruvizha, jabamalai, navnaal, 6 p.m.; tirupplai, Rev. I. Sathiyan, presides, 6.30 p.m.

HR and CE Department: Paavai Vizha, contests for school students, Vasavi Marriage hall, 8 a.m.

Periyar University: Department of Textile and Apparel Design, modular training programme on ‘industrial pattern making’, 10 a.m.

Sri Ganesh College of Arts and Science: Indian Red Cross Society training programme, P. Thirumoorthy, district coordinator, chief guest, T. Vijay Ganesh, secretary, inaugurates, M. Thangavel, correspondent, presides, 9.30 a.m.

Sona College of Technology: Department of Information Technology, workshop on ‘Ruby on Rails’, R. Seetha Rama Guptha, Product Developer, Freshdesk, Chennai, resource person, 10 a.m.

Knowledge Institute of Technology: National Mission on Education through ICT conducts ISTE sponsored STTP on ‘introduction to structural engineering’, 10 a.m.

Cluny Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Dance by girls on earthern pots for world record attempt, Fr. Benedict Anelin, Co-pastor, Infant Jesus Cathedral, chief guest, 8.30 a.m.

Sri Vidya Mandir Higher Secondary School, Kondalampatti: Annual Day, V. Panneer Selvam, MP, chief guest B. Shambu Kumar Guptha, Joint Secretary, Sri Vidya Mandir Association, distributes prizes, S. K. Selvam, MLA, presides, 5 p.m.

Salem Sri Sowdeswari Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Yoga for harmony, A. Kannammal, Correspondent and J. K. A. Kumara Rajah, Executive Trustee, participate, 9.30 a.m.

North Eastern Handicrafts and Handlooms Development Corporation Limited: North East crafts bazaar, Deiveegam Marriage hall, 10 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Malabar Gold and Diamonds: Artistry branded jewellery show, showroom, Bharathi street, Swarnapuri, 10 a.m.

National Book Trust and New Century Book House: National Book Festival book exhibition, Bose Maidan, 9.30 a.m. and 9.30 p.m.

Cooptex: New Year and Pongal handloom textiles exhibition, Bose Maidan, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Paavai Engineering College: IIT Bombay sponsored ISTE short term training programme on introduction to structured engineering, 10 a.m.

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Pongal Festival handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

Vivekanandha College of Arts and Science for Women: Department of Botany, national level workshop on ‘taxonomical techniques’ and tradition seeds expo, 10 a.m.
title: engagements
